can't somebody post another episode please??

***** FIX THIS ARCHIVE AND PLAY THE FILE - INFO HERE *****

Oki, this rar archive is corrupt, sad, but thats just how it is...

If you have WinRAR installed you can still extract the video file by doing the following :-

Right click on the file called gilmore.girls.714.hdtv.xvid.notv.part01.rar and select EXTRACT FILES from the WinRAR options.

This opens a new window asking where to save the archive, look in the bottom left corner of this window for the option that says KEEP BROKEN FILES.

This will extract the video file, it will still complain it's corrupt, and it is, but at least you have the file now !

Ok, now you will probably find the video will not play, I got a message along the lines of 'this file does not appear to be a valid avi file'.

So, to fix this, you can download a program called Video Fixer from this link :-
http://www.achensoft.com/download/vfjSetup.exe

Install this program, run it (you get 10 days fully working demo so you can uninstall it after the fix if you don't want to keep it).

Once it's running, drag the gilmore video file in to the window and click the FIX button on the left, it will take about 1 minute and it will create a new file in the same folder as the original, this new file plays just fine !!!!

There you have it, a working copy of this epispode... Enjoy...

Thanks goes to kollll for all his time and all his uploads, it seems we just got unlucky with this one.
